## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Frontend (if applicable)
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined
- [ ] Components are accessible (WCAG 2.1)
- [ ] Responsive design tested on mobile/tablet/desktop
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Tailwind CSS classes follow project conventions
- [ ] Performance impact assessed (bundle size, rendering)

### Backend (if applicable)
- [ ] API endpoints have Swagger documentation
- [ ] Database migrations created and tested
- [ ] DTOs have proper validation decorators
- [ ] Error handling implemented
- [ ] Authentication/authorization checked
- [ ] Performance impact assessed (query optimization, caching)

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed in code or logs
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] SQL injection prevented (parameterized queries)
- [ ] XSS prevention implemented
- [ ] CSRF protection in place (if needed)
- [ ] Dependencies scanned for vulnerabilities

### Database (if applicable)
- [ ] Migration tested (up and down)
- [ ] Indexes added for performance
- [ ] Foreign key constraints defined
- [ ] Default values and constraints set
- [ ] Data migration script provided (if needed)

<!-- Any special considerations for deployment -->

- [ ] Database migration required
- [ ] Environment variables need updating
- [ ] Third-party service configuration needed
- [ ] Cache needs to be cleared
- [ ] Breaking changes require versioning
